import * as DocFooter from './doc-footer.stories';

<Meta of={DocFooter} />

# DocFooter

## Overview

The DocFooter component serves as a dedicated section at the end of a document, designed specifically for gathering user feedback.
It integrates an interactive link leading to a feedback form, allowing users to share their thoughts, ask questions, or leave comments.

<Canvas of={DocFooter.Overview} />
